text: The 2016 ITF Men's Circuit is the 2016 edition of the second tier tour for men's professional tennis. It is organised by the International Tennis Federation and is a tier below the ATP Tour. The ITF Men's Circuit includes tournaments with prize money ranging from $10,000 up to $25,000. == Key == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; width:15%;" |- style="background:lightblue;" |
